title: Sweet Serendipity
description: "You're my serendipity. I wasn't looking for you. I wasn't expecting you. But I'm very lucky to have met you."Blair Rivera's life was perfect, until it wasn't. She has big dreams and is determined to make them happen. She got into the college of her dreams and is living with her two best friends. She even managed to hold onto her family that was hanging on by a thread. Caden is an aspiring musician with a brooding past and parent's who refuse to acknowledge his dreams. Meanwhile, Blair's happy go-lucky best friend - Azalea struggles with problems she can't talk about. And Troy - Blair's childhood best friend - is at constant conflict about his feelings for the girl he's been in love with all his life. Except she seems to be falling into someone else's arms.With these rising conflicts, will they be able to help each other or will they push each other to their breaking points?
author: Naomi Amanda
